text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI ALPHA 15 A3DD-003 15.6" 120 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 3750H (2.30 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 5500M 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI ALPHA 15 A3DD-003 15.6" 120 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 3750H (2.30 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 5500M 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The processor in the MSI ALPHA 15 A3DD-003 15.6" 120 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 3750H (2.30 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 5500M 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The display quality in the MSI ALPHA 15 A3DD-003 15.6" 120 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 3750H (2.30 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 5500M 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the display quality. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI ALPHA 15 A3DD-003 15.6" 120 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 3750H (2.30 GHz) AMD Radeon RX 5500M 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
